messages.title: NHS
messages.content: As a former director of NHS Yorkshire, lobby for our hospitals to get their fair share of the new government investment.

messages.title: TRANSPORT
messages.content: Support better bus and rail links to nearby towns and London: vital to attract investment, to help communities prosper.

messages.title: BREXIT
messages.content: Honour the result of the referendum that Britain leave the EU and move forward to a better future.

messages.title: EDUCATION
messages.content: More support for our excellent teachers so all children can have an outstanding education.

messages.title: SKILLS TRAINING
messages.content: As an engineer I know the importance of training our workforce for the technologies of the future.

messages.title: TRUST
messages.content: Born in Hallam, with a heart for my community, I want to rebuild trust that Hallam voters' needs can be represented at the heart of government.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lobby for hospitals to get their fair share of the new government investment.
Support better bus and rail links to nearby towns and London to attract investment and help communities prosper.
Honour the result of the referendum that Britain leave the EU and move forward to a better future.
More support for excellent teachers so all children can have an outstanding education.
Training the workforce for the technologies of the future.
Rebuild trust that Hallam voters' needs can be represented at the heart of government.
